article_title: Fallon Health partners Cognizant for biz process automation
article_text:
NEW DELHI: IT firm Cognizant has partnered with Fallon Health, a not-for-profit healthcare services firm, to become the first Massachusetts-based health insurer providing quotes for merged market plans.



The solution will help Fallon comply with Affordable Care Act (ACA) requirements around member-level rating and conducting Health Insurance Exchange activity more effectively, Cognizant said in a statement.

article_summary:
NEW DELHI: IT firm Cognizant has partnered with Fallon Health, a not-for-profit healthcare services firm, to become the first Massachusetts-based health insurer providing quotes for merged market plans.
The solution will help Fallon comply with Affordable Care Act (ACA) requirements around member-level rating and conducting Health Insurance Exchange activity more effectively, Cognizant said in a statement.
